items.title: Espresso
items.desc: A strong and bold coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans. Perfect for a quick caffeine boost.

items.title: Latte
items.desc: A smooth and creamy coffee made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a light layer of foam.

items.title: Green Tea
items.desc: A refreshing and healthy tea made from steamed green tea leaves. Rich in antioxidants and perfect for any time of day.

items.title: Chai Latte
items.desc: A spiced tea made with black tea, milk, and a blend of aromatic spices. Sweet and warming.

FAQ.question: What are your opening hours?
FAQ.answer: We are open from 7 AM to 9 PM every day.

FAQ.question: Do you offer vegan options?
FAQ.answer: Yes, we have a variety of vegan options available on our menu.

FAQ.question: Do you have free Wi-Fi?
FAQ.answer: Yes, we offer free Wi-Fi for all our customers.

FAQ.question: Can I make a reservation?
FAQ.answer: We do not take reservations, but we have plenty of seating available.
